topic.title: Shortcut keys for next EXACT, FUZZY, NO match segment

body.p:
Translators can jump to the next untranslated segment using one of these options:
next untranslated segment with Any match. This means, the next untranslated segment is identified, regardless of whether there are matches found or not.
next untranslated segment with EXACT match. This means, the next untranslated segment is identified, for which an Exact match is found. Other untranslated segments are ignored.
next untranslated segment with FUZZY match. This means, the next untranslated segment is identified, for which a Fuzzy match is found. Other untranslated segments are ignored.
next untranslated segment with NO match. This means, the next untranslated segment is identified, for which No matches are found. Other untranslated segments are ignored.

The default hot-key assigned for Next Untranslated Segment => Any is Alt+n. Users can assign their own hotkeys for With EXACT match, With FUZZY match, and With NO match using the function Options => Keys... (see page ).
